short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to send a nudge to AMPT from gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Send timely and authentic recognition (we call them nudges) to your team right from your email. 

With the Chrome Gmail add-on, you can send recognition on AMPT in seconds all while you send your email. It's that easy.

AMPT is the easiest and most effective way to recognize your team in their moments of greatness. 

To use the AMPT Gmail Plugin you must participate in your employerâ€™s AMPT employee recognition program.

Don't have AMPT? Sign up for a demo of the platform at https://amptnow.com/
